## Description
A clear description of the bug.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Run `codebak ...`
2. See error

## Expected Behavior
What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior
What actually happened.

- OS: [e.g., macOS 14.0, Ubuntu 22.04]

Any other relevant information, logs, or screenshots.
